summary: This is a retexture of all the Dragonbone weapons in the Dawnguard DLC, giving the weapons a lighter bone with reddish metal look.
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture of all the Dragonbone weapons in the Dawnguard DLC, giving the weapons a lighter bone with reddish metal look. 

After retexturing the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24791]Dragonbone Bow[/url] I realized it wasn\'t that much work to recolor the other weapons as well, and so I did. They\'re all made to match my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24786]Dragonscale Ivory Armor[/url] retexture.

I also noticed the texture for the scabbard was really low-resolution. I tried to improve the texture a little, with limited success...
author: Damanique
